approving If you do something observantly, you are good or quick at noticing things: In this poem, she comments observantly on lost love. He very observantly pointed out some habits that I didn't even realize I had. Synonym
perceptively

observantly adverb
(RELIGIOUS)
in a way that obeys religious rules or customs: I choose to dress observantly, but do not feel any pressure to do so. He is an observantly teetotal Muslim friend of mine.
More examplesFewer examplesHe had always led an observantly Jewish way of life.I don't see any reason why, as a scientist, I can't also be observantly religious.
